PRIVACY: Personally Identifiable Information (PII) requiring protection from unauthorized disclosure. Includes general PII and Sensitive PII.
EXPORT: Information limited by export control laws such as ITAR and EAR, including technical data, defense articles, or dual-use technologies.
FINPROT: Financially sensitive information, including transactional, operational, or proprietary financial details protected under regulatory frameworks.
PROCURE: Information related to acquisition, bidding, procurement, and contract negotiation that must be protected during competitive phases.
LEGAL: Attorney-client privileged information, legal analyses, litigation strategy, or regulatory investigation details requiring controlled distribution.
TECHDATA: Technical specifications, engineering drawings, operational parameters, or internal system documentation requiring controlled distribution.
